Package com.azure.spring.messaging.implementation.config

Interface MethodAzureListenerEndpoint

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, AzureListenerEndpoint, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware
All Known Implementing Classes:
MethodEventHubsListenerEndpoint, MethodServiceBusListenerEndpoint
public interface MethodAzureListenerEndpoint extends org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware, AzureListenerEndpoint
Model for a method Azure listener endpoint.
